description:
Do you want to develop a computer game by yourself and don't know how to start ?If yes then you are at right place.This course is Your first step on the journey from someone who play games to someone who Develop games.

This course is design for those who want to develop a game but don't know how to start?

In this Course Will Smith will teach every things you need to be a professional game Developer.He will teach you line by line to Develop Two High Quality Games using Python and Pygame.

Why take this Course?

This course is Design by a Professional Game Designer So You will absolutely get benefit from his Experience.

The games are developed using python and Pygame both are available free to download and use so You not need to pay for the softwares.

All the source codes,images and sound used in this Course are available to Download But Smith request you to pause and type the same codes, Smith typed in the Course for Solid understanding.He also request you to modify the code and then run it to learn more.
title: Learn to create Computer games with python and pygame
